#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType GolfCourse.

== Name ==

*[CGolfCourse GolfCourse]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--GolfCourse (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Description of a course: Mmedia (photographs, videos, sketches...), notes, holes and tee-set.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  (name, architect?, ([CMedia media] | [CNote note])`*` , [CHoles holes]?, [CTees tee-set]+, [CVersion version]`*`  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| xs:string || architect ||  					Architect(s) of the golf course.				 ||
|| [CHoles golfml:Holes] || [CHoles holes] ||  					Description of the individual holes.				 ||
|| [CMedia golfml:Media] || [CMedia media] ||  						Medias associated with the golf course.					 ||
|| xs:string || name ||  Name of a tee set. ||
|| [CNote golfml:Note] || [CNote note] ||  						Notes and comments associated with the golf course.					 ||
|| [CTees golfml:Tees] || [CTees tee-set] ||  					Description of a tee set for the golf course.				 ||
|| [CVersion golfml:Version] || [CVersion version] ||  					Records history of the golf course.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CCountryClub CountryClub]
----
